resources.string: Catus: sleeps 16 hours, awake for 8 hours. Likes warm sunny days. Likes small wind.
Dogus: sleeps 8 hours, awake for 16 hours. Likes warm sunny days. Likes medium wind.
Frogus: sleeps 12 hours, awake for 12 hours. Likes cold cloudy days. Does not like wind.
Do you know anything about exhumated grave?
I don\'t know anything but we could investigate, bring me something from there.
Ok, I\'ll see what I can find
Look what I\'ve found near the grave
Hmm, interesting, let me see where it\'ll lead me…
No, not yet, but I\'m searching.
Look, I\'ve found this strange book on ritual site. Take it.
Thanks, do you know who can help me with it?
Try to ask catus they usually more experienced in wisdom stuff, the older the better.
[Show the book] Do you know anything about this book?
What\'s this? I can sense some magic but I\'m not sure…
Ahh, yes, I know what it is. This is Necronomicon. Do you with to use it or destroy it?
